curam.util.administration.impl

Class DeferredInstanceErrorListSize<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.dataaccess.ReadmultiOperation<T>
      • curam.util.dataaccess.StandardReadmultiOperation<T>
        • curam.util.administration.impl.DeferredInstanceErrorListSize<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of each row in the search result set.

    @AccessLevel(value=EXTERNAL)
public class DeferredInstanceErrorListSize<T>
extends StandardReadmultiOperation<T>
    Contains operations that may be used by methods wishing to limit the size of the deferred error instance search results. This class extends StandardReadmultiOperation. This is required in order to throw a ReadmultiMaxException when the maximum is exceeded; the standard operation does not do this.
